name: Minecraft Version
doc: The current version of Minecraft that is being compiled for.

name: Minecraft Version Greater Than
doc: Whether the version of Minecraft being compiled for is greater than the specified version (for example, minecraft_neq_1_20_2). Respects snapshots, betas, etc.

name: Minecraft Version Greater Than or Equal
doc: Whether the version of Minecraft being compiled for is greater than or equal to the specified version (for example, minecraft_neq_1_20_2). Respects snapshots, betas, etc.

name: Minecraft Version Equal
doc: Whether the version of Minecraft being compiled for is equal to the specified version (for example, minecraft_neq_1_20_2). Respects snapshots, betas, etc.

name: Minecraft Version Not Equal
doc: Whether the version of Minecraft being compiled for is not equal to the specified version (for example, minecraft_neq_1_20_2). Respects snapshots, betas, etc.

name: Minecraft Version less Than
doc: Whether the version of Minecraft being compiled for is less than the specified version (for example, minecraft_neq_1_20_2). Respects snapshots, betas, etc.

name: Minecraft Version less Than or Equal
doc: Whether the version of Minecraft being compiled for is less than or equal to the specified version (for example, minecraft_neq_1_20_2). Respects snapshots, betas, etc.

name: Minecraft Fabric
doc: Whether Minecraft Fabric is the mod loader being compiled for.

name: Minecraft Forge
doc: Whether Minecraft Forge is the mod loader being compiled for.
